attributes.action: HAVE A TRANSPARENT CONSULTATION WITH THE LOCAL POPULATION OF THOSE VILLAGES IMPACTED BY THE PLAN TO BUILD AN "ECO" TOWN IN CURBOROUGH STAFFORDSHIRE BEFORE PLANS ARE APPROVED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are quite advanced plans to build an "Eco" Town at Curborough Staffordshire. The plan would see 5000 homes built on green belt land with a significant impact on the surrounding communities of Fradley, Alrewas, Lichfield and Kings Bromley. As is often the case with these types of schemes the area concerned does not have the necessary basic infrastructure in place - Roads, Schools, Amenities to support such an initiative. Satisfying these in full consultaion with the local community, would have to be one of the caveats for such a development
